title: Ornate trophy pedestal

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ornate trophy pedestal can be built in the pedestal space of the League hall in a player-owned house. It requires 64 Construction to build and when built, it gives 2,106 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The ornate trophy pedestal can be built in the pedestal space of the League hall in a player-owned house. It requires 64 Construction to build and when built, it gives 2,106 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The player can use trophies from Leagues they've participated in on the ornate pedestal to display them. Players can build up to three pedestals in the League hall; building an ornate pedestal in one hotspot does not automatically fill the others.

Contents

  • 2 Gallery
    • 2.1 Twisted League
    • 2.2 Trailblazer League
    • 2.3 Shattered Relics League

The '''ornate trophy pedestal''' can be built in the [[pedestal space]] of the [[League hall]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 64 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 2,106 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

The player can use [[Trophy|trophies]] from [[Leagues]] they've participated in on the ornate pedestal to display them. Players can build up to three pedestals in the League hall; building an ornate pedestal in one hotspot does not automatically fill the others.
